abstract: The role and use of race within health-related artificial intelligence and machine learning (AI/ML) models has sparked increasing attention and controversy. Despite the complexity and breadth of related issues, a robust and holistic framework to …

title: Melanoma in Skin of Color: Increasing Awareness and Achieving Better Disease Outcomes–A Call to Action
details: WI Visser, B Tod - EJC Skin Cancer, 2025
abstract: Despite its lower incidence, melanoma in Skin of Color (SoC) populations is associated with significantly worse outcomes due to delayed diagnosis and barriers to optimal treatment [1],[2]. Melanoma is color blind and does not discriminate based …
